you knock on katies door and her a teenagers voice reply "who is it?"
you shout back "its me brandon"
after a few seconds you hear some movement and a loud bang as she swears quite loudly before opening the door

she gives you a confused look and says " depends on what you're after " with a half annoyed and half loving smile

121.content:
"well i wanted to play a trick on mom. you pretend to be me and vice versa, and she her reaction" you say smiling

katies sighs "brandon i've got homework to do, if i agree would you as pretending to be me do it"

knowing how smart you are katie has exploited you before in the homework area, specially since she can never be bothered to do it herself.t

you look at her amused "sure i can do it AGAIN"

"good katie im going into MY room to play xbox" she retorts getting into the role

as she smiles at you, you get a remote out your pocket and press a couple of buttons and you both pass out.

you start to awake only to find yourself in your sisters room lay on her bet, you lay there looking at the ceiling wondering if it worked and reach your hand upwards and stop, you notice your hand is alot slimmer now and your nails are painted a emerald green colour, you shoot upright and orange hair falls infront of your face. getting excited you dash for a mirror and stare into the reflection "im ginger!!"

13.title: Kari

choices: she loses herself to the new feelings of being a mature male
she keeps control and take you to the mall
131.content:
When you came too and slowly sat up you where staring at your old body. You start to giggle in your little sister's voice. "It worked." You said and leaped at your body hugging it as Kari who was now in your body hugged you and held you in your old arms. "This is so cool. Can, we go out big brother?" You playfully ask making her laugh at your words and nod in agreement.

"Okay, to the park first. I want to get use to your body." She said as she stood up holding you in her new arms. "Wow, I was that light?" you h ear your voice and smiled as you rest your head on his shoulder. You now can see what it was like when you always carried her around in your arms. He had one arm under the skirt for you to sit on while the other one was behind your back as support. "Okay little sis lets go." He said as he started to walk out and was finding it odd to walk as a boy.

"I was resting against him as I was relax and looked over to see the Swings that where in the park. Not many kids where out yet because there was a call for a strong storm to come. "Swings please. Let me sit in your lap please big brother." You ask cutely and he only giggled at you and patted your back as he moved you into his lap as he sat on the swing. My legs where to each side of him as my arms where wrapped around his neck. "Ready." I said and giggled as Kari started to swing but was not getting control of your old boy fully yet. For it was starting to get stiff from your little body rubbing against hers. "um, we need to stop..." I whimpered as I felt my old body reacting that way but Kari never felt such feelings before and didn't want to stop so only continued and got stiffer and stiff her which only was poking at my pink undies with a baby blue bow on the front. "Please Kari, you need to get control." You said in a scared voice as your body is shivering from the feeling.

"you like it." You hear your voice say and become scared and try to squirm off of your old lap but this only made Kari stop the swings and place both arms behind you and pull you in close lining up her now stiffen body with your young body. You then feel your body get pulled down and you start to cry in fear and pain making Kari stop and realize what she was doing. She hugged you tight and rubbed your back. "Sorry. I didn't mean to hurt you and my body. you okay? Being a boy is hard." She said as I was shivering and nodded my head just happy that it stopped before there was any penetration.

"That scared me." You said as you rubbed your eyes and moved a little and blushed from how close it was to being something that the two of you would hate yourselves fore the rest of your lives.

"Sorry, I promise to try and keep control." Kari said as she stroked your back. Please stop crying." She said as she held you close to her and was comforting you.
131.title: yes

choices: Look around the mall some more
Go to the swimming pool (stop by home to get the swimming suits first)
1312.content:
It took you about a minute to finally stop crying as your old body continued to comfort you. Clearly just as Kari had gotten carried away by the male hormones, you yourself were starting to act more in accordance to your little sister's body and her little brain that was now housing your consciousness rather how you would have usually reacted. You were legitimately scared for a sec, but scared in the way a confused little girl would be. But you weren't really bothered by that right now, for you were feeling better, especially now that Kari had promised to take you to the mall.

Since the mall wasn't very far, you decided to walk on the ground alongside Kari while holding his hand. Somehow by the time you two had arrived at the mall, you felt a lot more safe around Kari, confident that she had been now taken control of your old body's male hormones. Before entering the mall, you started tugging on Kari's arms. "Too much walking! I want a piggy back ride" You said, lifting your arms upward. Kari lifted you up onto his shoulders and you made sure to wrap your arms around his head as the two of you entered the mall.

Riding up on your old body's shoulders made you feel really big; even though you had been this tall not too long ago now you had the luxury of being so small and getting a grand view of the crowd of people around the two of you. Kari bounced his shoulders a bit, making you giggle. "More big brother! Bounce me some more!" you playfully ask Kari who proceeded to bounce you some more as laughter projected out of your mouth.

You begin to hug your old head a little tighter. "I love you, big brother" you say to Kari, who giggled a little.

"I love you too" She tells you, pausing before adding "Kari". You giggled at how your once little sister was now calling you by her own name; it felt really cute being referred to as such. Kari then asks you where you want to go first. You then immediately begin pointing at the nearest clothing store.

You tried out all sorts of girly little outfits at the store. In your old body you would have died of embarrassment at the idea of wearing such feminine attire, but as a little girl you couldn't help but play around and experiment with how cute you could make yourself look. There was a cute little pink dress that you had fallen in love with, however since neither you or Kari had brought any money with y'all you had to leave the cute dress at the store - however Kari then promised that she would buy you that dress next time. Though that also made the two of you think a bit of just how long y'all were going to stay in each other bodies.

Next the two of you look around a toy store, and while you found all the girly dolls cute you were still interested in all the other types of action figures. Kari playfully begged you not to turn 'her' into a "boyish girl", but you insisted that "even tomboys can be cute", After a while, the two of you left the toy store.

After looking around a few more places, the two of you sit down in a bench to rest, with you sitting in your old body's lap (you were confident that Kari would not try to penetrate you anymore) as your old arms held you in place.

"So what now?" Kari asks you, looking down as you look up.
1312.title: she keeps control and take you to the mall

13123.content:
Before you know it, you were yawning right in front of Kari. "Ia sweepee" you were so tired you were slurring your own words.

Kari, in your old body, stands up, lightly rocking you in his arms. "It's around my nap time now that I recall. Though I guess it would be your nap time, right Kari?"

"Juz... tak we hum.." you fall asleep in your old body's arms.

When you wake up, you aren't at the mall or in your old body's arms. Instead you are tucked in bed, in Kari's bedroom. Though it was really your room at the moment. Just as all of Kari's clothes and her toys on the floor were your's right now.

"Kari's bedroom is bigger than I remember" you think to yourself, almost forgetting that you were still occupying Kari's small 5 year old body. "Oh, that's right".

Before you did anything else, your mom enters the room. "Oh, I was just now coming to check on you"

"I just woke up Mommy" you tell your mom while rubbing your eyes. You made sure to call her "Mommy" rather than just "Mom" in order to blend in as "Kari".

"Your older brother should really have brought you back home well before your naptime. But at the very least it's good to see the two of you hang out" Mom tells you.

Your tummy rumbles. "I feel hungry"

"I'll make you a little snack then. Does peanut butter and gram crackers sound good?"

You nod.

You have your little snack while Kari, in your body, decides to use the opportunity to play some of your M rated video games.

You basically spend the rest of the day as Kari, and Kari as you.

After dinner, you come up to Kari asking if she wants to swap back yet.

"But I was wanting to sleep as you tonight" Kari answers

"There's nothing special about sleeping" you reply

"Sure there is. I get to sleep as a big boy tonight, and you can sleep with my stuffed animals. Doesn't that sound like fun"

Kari seemed to be really into this idea, so you let her sleep in your body for the night.

Mom helps you into the little night gown, tucking you in bed before kissing you goodnight.

"Goodnight princess"

"Night Mommy". It had been a while since you were tucked in bed and kissed goodnight by Mom. It felt really good.

After Mom turns off the lights and clises the door, did not take long for you to fall asleep.

The next morning, you walk up to Kari, still in your old pajamas.

"Can we swap back now?" You ask Kari.
13123.title: go home (switch back or not)

choices: Politely pass and swap bodies with someone else instead
131231.content:
Kari nods, willing the two of you to swap back into the right bodies.

"I gotta admit, it was kind of fun being the little sister for a change" you tell Kari, having you own voice back

"Was I a good big brother" Kari asks you, making sure to give off puppy dog eyes

"Sure I guess." you admit

"Good cause to be honest I kind of want to swap bodies again" Kari says

"But we just now swapped back"

"But it was a lot of fun being you" Kari says

"Well I did say it was fun being little Kari now did I?" you say

You honestly wouldn't mind being in your little sister's body for just a little longer. However you were kind of hoping to find someone else to swap bodies with. Though you could always just swap bodies from Kari's body - you kind of were getting the feeling that Kari was getting a little too comfortable with using your body.
131231.title: Kari replies yes

choices: Positively, you like being the little sister Kari
Negatively, you want your body back now!
131232.content:
To your surprise, Kari shakes her head sideways.

"Sorry little sister but I like being in your body. I get to be a big boy, play cool games and do all sorts of cool things - and I don't need a nap time anymore"

How do you respond?
131232.title: Kari replies no

1312321.content:
You weren't too worried about Kari's response in all honesty.

"Well I guess I did enjoy being the little sister yesterday. And I'm not sure if I am ready to swap back either"

Kari seemed surprised with your response. "Really?!?!"

You nod happily

Kari breathed a sigh of relief "I was afraid that you would be complaining about wanting your body back"

"Nah, it's good. You can keep it" you tell your old body "This body is a lot more fun" you say while playing with your hair.

"I think your body is more fun, but ok little sister" with that your old body proceeds to do whatever.

You go back to what will now be your room, picking out which of your little sister's clothes to wear. You settle for a white dress. You let your hair stay free since you don't know how Mom makes your hair in two pony tails. You also add a cute little white ribbon in your hair before heading to the bathroom. Standing on the stool, you look at your self in the mirror.

"I look cute" you think to yourself.

Of course, now you remind yourself that you still have your swapping powers. Bit what to do with them?
1312321.title: Positively, you like being the little sister Kari

13123211.content:
Note - I apologize for the confusion, when I typed "swap powers" I meant the body swap remote.

Holding onto the body swap remote, which had now shrunk to fit in Kari's - or now "your" small hands, you think about who in your family you'd like to swap with?

There was Mom, who has a single mother was always very tired from her work - she could barely ever cook dinner on a consistent basis. She might take the chance to be a little kid again if given the opportunity - plus since it would be Kari's body she would feel more comfortable swapping with another female over say your original teen boy body.
Then there was your big sister Katie too. She was always treating you like a pest, belittling you at every moment possible. She was also so narcissistic; just cause she was a cheerleader that made her all that. Forcing her to swap bodies with you and thus leave her in Kari's body would most certainly teach her a lesson - and you were always curious about high school.

Laying on your bed, tapping the remote against your chin, you think about who'd you wanna swap with the most - Mom or your big sister. Before long you get tired and take a short nap. You wake up to Mom who congratulates you for taking naptime all on your own. Heading out your room, you notice Katie on the phone, talking with some friend of hers about some stupid annoying gossip talk - in that snotty accent too.

Taking a good look at both Mom and Katie you finally come to a decision. Hiding the remote behind your back you walk up to...
13123211.title: Use on another family member

choices: is so happy about being a littlr girl again
demands you swap their bodies back
131232111.content:
Approaching Mom, still hiding the remote behind your back, you do what Kari would have done, slightly lean back with crossed legs while putting in the most cutesy face you could think of and speak up. "Mommy?"

Mom turns her attention away for the cook book. "Yes sweetheart?" She asks you. She gave you the warmest smile she put manage despite her clearly worn out mental state.

"Can Ie show ya somezing?" You ask with Kari's super cute kiddie accent.

"In a bit dear" she replies

"But Mommy, I really wanna show you"

"Mommy needs to do something first"

"Pweaze Mommy, pweaze" you say, putting on the sadest looking puppy dog eyes ever. It was so easy to get what you want with Kari's cute little girl appeance, evident by your tired Mom nodding.

"Ok dear, real quick" she answers.

You happily lead her to your room, where you ready the remote.

"So what did you wanna show Mommy?" asks Mom.

You couldn't help but giggle as you reveal the remote in your hands.

"This Mommy" you say before smashing the button. In a flash, you now find yourself in Mom's body, evident by the extra weight on your chest. The remote had teleported in your hand too. Meanwhile Kari's body stood there confused before touching its own face.

"Wha happen to me" says Mom. She looks up to you "and why am I ovah thah?" She asks pointing at you. Looking at her own adult body in front of her, separate from her, Mom started to realize what happened. She was now in body of her youngest daughter. "What ya do to me Kari?" Mom says in Kari's accent. You giggle at your Mom.

"Mommy I swapped out bodies. I wanted to be Mommy, and I thought you would like being a little girl again" you asnwer to the confused little girl.

Running up Kari's mirror, Mom observes herself, pinching herself, but not matter what she did she still saw Kari's reflection mimicking her every move.

Looking back at you, Mom...
131232111.title: Mom

choices: Csrtoons (still pretend that you're Kari in Mom's body)
1312321111.content:
Immediately Mom, now in Kari's body, leaps onto Kari's bed and starts jumping up and down on the bed. Childish laughter exits her mouth as she jumps on the bed over and over.

"I can't beweev Imma little girl again" Mom exclaims with excitement.

"No jumping on the bed young lady" you tease Mom before swooping her off the bed, holding her in her arms. It felt strange holding your Mom in your arms, even if it was technically Kari's body.

Mom giggles. "Sowi Mommy" she replies playfully and hugs you tightly. "Okah Kari, I let ya be Mommy, buh onwi fah a day. Promith?"

You reply "yes mam"

Mom giggles again and says "Im so happy I get to be a little girl again. I can't wait to pwah with 'my' toys"

"Mommy?"

"Call me Kari sweety" says Mom "I reawi wanna be immersd in aw this"

"Ok... Kari" you say, barely holding back laughter at calling your Mom 'Kari'. "How do I cook?" You ask in a deceivingly innocent manner - you knew Mom thought you were the real Kari (that she didn't suspect that it was her son in Kari's body before) so you pretending to not know how to cook knowing Mom would reply -

"Just haf Katie order pizza tonight"

"Okay Kari. Now you go play" you say, putting Mom gently down on the floor. Mom takes out some of Kari's dolls to play with while you tell Katie to order pizza. Katie was surprisingly snotty about it "whatever lizzie" Katie told you; she never respected Mom for whatever reason, always using Mom's name instead of "Mom".

Flopping onto the coach, you sit back and turn on the tv, ready to enjoy your day as "Mom". Flipping through the channels you end up watching...
1312321111.title: is so happy about being a littlr girl again

13123212.content:
You have trouble thinking of what else you could use your body swap powers for.

After spending several more days as "Kari" you find a use for your powers -
13123212.title: More

choices: trick Jason into swapping bodies with you
don't waste your time on Jason
131232122.content:
It's been several months and you still haven't thought of who to swap bodies with. You didn't want to swap bodies with your parents and or your big sister Katie. And Kari was alway content with having your body. So you stayed in Kari's young body.

You were looking at the mirror and admiring the cute outfit you had pixked for yourself (you had picked a pink hearted shirth with a matching skirt and shoes - and Mom helped you tie the long red hair into two pig tails) when you realized how long it has been since you had swapped bodies with your little sister. "Wow, I can't believe that I've already been Kari for 3 whole months!" you thought aloud. Chuckles come out your mouth. "I could really stay as Kari forever" you say aloud; you come to think of yourself not as your old identity but as Kari instead. You liked being the baby sister more than being the middle child - Mom and Dad gave you so much attention, which made you feel more loved as Kari than when you were you. School was easier too since you started going to Kari's kindergarten; you thought were would be bored but instead you felt relaxed in kindergarten. Kari's friends were fun to play with too, which especially helped you to adjust to being a little girl.

Also being Kari made you feel cute.

It was recess, while you were searching for your new friends, when a little boy came up to you and pushed you to the ground.

"Ow! What ya do that for!" You cry. You had fallen on your butt and it hurt.

"Because you're just a stupid girl!" Says the boy. Looking up, you immediately recognized the little boy. His name was Jason and he had been harassing you ever since you started going to Kindergarten. You had no idea why, and you definitely wished Kari had bothered to tell you before. You'd tell on him but everytime you tried to tell the teacher Jason would play the victim to get you in trouble instead - you still remember that undeserved spanking you received from Mom just a few weeks ago.

"You're a meanie Jason!" You whine "Someday I will teach you a lesson!". You try to get back up, but to no avail as Jason pushes you back down.

"Oh yeah what are you going to do about it girly?" Jason threatens

On the verge of tears, you wanted to scream - but then you remembered something. You still had your body swap powers. And now would be a perfect time to use them.

1323.content:
There is a bright flash of light and suddenly you feel different. You try to get up and look around, but to no avail. All of a sudden from your mouth you hear, “oh brudder what happend” In your voice, but with the dialect of a little kid. “Hey, that wasn’t me” you try to say, but nothing comes out of your mouth. All of a sudden, you get up and look around, but you have not control over it. “I’m so tall!” Your mouth says. “I think I’m brother” it says. Your legs carry you to your mirror, but it seems as if your watching a video. You look in the mirror and eeek. “I’m big brother, I’m big brother!”
With that, your suspicions are confirmed. You are now being controlled by your little sister
“This is bad. Really bad...” you think.
“No it’s not”, you then say.
“Wait, you can hear me?” You ask Kari, who is now you.
“Yeah! Big bro.” She giggles
Well, you guys can communicate, but this is still not good because...
1323.title: She ends up POSSESSING you

14.content:
Authors note: First of all, this is Kari, due to the fact that the original Kari was taken up. Two, I am not using the original plot, but my own. I hope the author is not offended by this.



Dam, another party.

Your mom had been a party fanatic since all long as you can remember, consistently inviting all of your family over. But it couldn't be the standard drink till you can't remember and do things that you'll regret, even though that was how you where conceived, it's the, dress your son up like an Idiot and ask the family about wine. Oh, and make him watch your annoying little sister while you chat with uncle Jon. Dam, these parties where annoying. And after a while, being the richest in the family and showing it off grows WAY old. Although you couldn't protest because your mom would make you watch your older sister encase she slipped out again. While you didn't give a dam, when your mom dyed her hair black a week ago your sister made the biggest fit over doing it as well, and after a stern no, she crept out and did it herself. Even though your mom acted paranoid about it, you could tell she liked it. It was just an excuse to punish you. Besides, your sister would just stay in her room festering over the amount of make up she wore. Apparently there was a thing as 'to much blush' or 'to little eye shadow'. You could never tell. But none the less, it was still a party. Your little sister was going to be horrid.
Describing your little sister was difficult. To sum it up, distant. She did her kitty voice near you in public, but at home it was different. Your mom wadded hand and feet on her, and your older sister was her full time friend. Your contact with her was limited. So in parties, she just hung with your older sister the hole time.
You stroll down the stairs, keeping your chest held high so your suit didn't crease. You trip over the fifth stair and stumble down. You smack your head on the floor, curse, then spring up, hoping that he whole family didn't see you. Despite a few uneasy glances you were fine.
...

The party stunk. All you did was eat soup and pretend to like the turkey. Your aunt made stupid jokes, Your sisters didn't even come down this time, and your mom was to busy showing off her new hair to scold them. Your sister had a fit over putting on her make up for nothing, and Kari was dead asleep at 7:00. Dam, you hated these parties. You make no attempt to stay up as you strip down to bed. You are dead asleep before you hit the pillow.
14.title: Kari

choices: Your older sister wakes your up
141.content: Light crept into your open window shaft, and like a early morning bird, woke you. For a brief second you feel peaceful, like a warm blanket had been wrapped around you, then your heart beat fastens. Something was horribly wrong. You spring out of your bed in a hastily fashion before finding a flaw. You where small, unrealistically small, and this wasn't your room, it was your little sisters. The cabinet that had once been so small to you now toward above you like a giant. You look down at the floor to see that you weren't wearing your normal cloths, but your little sister. Then, reality hits you like a bullet. You were your sister. You race to look at your little sisters mirror and complex at the image. Your sister was unquestionably there, and staring right at you with her big blue eyes. She shared your fearful look, your beating heart, and your awkward stance. You put your now tiny hands on your face and needlessly stroke, a useless action, but one that you can not control. Tears roll down your eyes, and in a strange subconscious action you touch the mirror. She touches back. You begin to take attention to your feelings and wince. Your body felt unrealistic, and extremely uncomfortable. Every action you made, from your breathing, to the wiggling of your toes, felt out of place. Even standing still your overly weak arms, your tiny lungs, and the incomprehensible feeling of the sex change felt oh so wrong. You grab your red hair and stroke it, absorbing its texture. Somehow your little sisters silky, smooth, soft hair calmed you. It was like a blankets threads had been unraveled and plastered to your head. You whip her bangs from her eyes and toss her hair past her shoulders. Okay, focus. You needed to get out of these PJ's. The ponies were obscenely obnoxious. You find her stepping stool and grab two articles of clothing that didn't make you queasy. A red shirt and some tight little girl jeans. You close your eyes, for modesty sake, and take off her shirt. After a few failed tries you give up modesty and open your eyes. To your luck nothing bad was to be seen. You put on the red shirt and give a sigh of relief. Now for the jeans. You strip off her pants and are relived to find that she is wearing underwear. You squeeze into the jeans and fumble with the zipper for a few minuets before succeeding. You find a purple hair brush and smooth out any tangles. You look back in the mirror. Better. Well, as better as you can get while being your sister. You yawn and whip your eyes. Perhaps a little nap wouldn't hurt.
141.title: Oh Hell No

15.content:
Lucy is your teacher, she is 36 years old but gets mistaken for younger because of her short stature, she's very kind and is loved by everyone, she has a beautiful face and wears glasses that don't take away from her looks, she has black eyes and neck-length black hair, even though she's 8 months pregnant her chest is still quite small.

You wait till the end of school till everyone else has left and it's only you and her in the classroom, then when you feel the time is right you use the device.

Option 1: It worked you switched bodies with Lucy!

Option 2: It didn't work you switched bodies with her unborn baby!
15.title: At School

info.description: the character's are, You 13 average, Lizzie 36 your mom hourglass figure sway's hip's long blue hair alway's in a ponytail only wear's/has high heel's and skirt's E cup's, no dad, Katie 16 your older sister long orange hair cheerleader only wear's/has high heel's B cup's, Kari 5 cute long red hair in two ponytail's has kiddie accent, you can add new character's but give them a description no killing no sex small swearing no undressing to examing thier bodies only to change clothes have fun
